bibl.title: A Hoard of Ptolemaic Bronze Coins in the J. Paul Getty Museum.
bibl.note: 137 extant specimens, unearthed somewhere in the Egyptian Delta. Types of Philadelphus, Euergetes and Philopator. Appendix (p. 158): Ptolemaic bronze currency in Europe.
bibl.seg: Visonà Paolo, A Hoard of Ptolemaic Bronze Coins in the J. Paul Getty Museum.
137 extant specimens, unearthed somewhere in the Egyptian Delta. Types of Philadelphus, Euergetes and Philopator. Appendix (p. 158): Ptolemaic bronze currency in Europe.
